name: Off-Road Rides
description:
Off-Road Rides is an exciting game in which you have to avoid obstacles. Get behind the wheel of one of the cars and get to the finish line! Show all your skill and ability behind the wheel of a car! But be careful, there are various obstacles on your way! Overcome all obstacles and prove that you are the best racer in this world! But don't forget your time is limited!

Game Features:
- Different difficulty levels
- Several cars
- Beautiful graphics
- Great soundtrack
